articles.content:
A Model X is on display at a Tesla showroom on February 13, 2021 in Beijing, China.
What's behind the drop in tech stocks? A model Wall Street uses to value stocks is flashing caution.

articles.title: Fueled by tech, Wall Street rebounds at end of volatile week - Reuters
articles.description: Wall Street ended sharply higher after a volatile session on Friday, with the Nasdaq rebounding at the end of a week that saw it extend losses to about 10% from its previous record high.
